title: Rewarding accuracy gets people to spot more misinformation
description: Even if you pay conservatives, they're not as good at IDing fake news as liberals.

title: The time has come: GitHub expands 2FA requirement rollout March 13
description: Certain types of users enroll first, but it will be universal by year's end.

title: North Korean hackers target security researchers with a new backdoor
description: Campaign uses carefully crafted LinkedIn accounts that mimic legit people.

title: YouTuber must pay $40K in attorneys’ fees for daft “reverse censorship” suit
description: Judge said the complaint from "Young Pharaoh" never had a chance of winning.

title: This Yellowstone hot spring’s rhythmic thump makes it a geo-thermometer
description: Silence intervals between the thumping reveal how much heat is entering Doublet Pool.

title: Congressman confronts FBI over “egregious” unlawful search of his personal data
description: Section 702 unlikely to be reauthorized without reforms to protect US citizens.

title: Stadia’s pivot to a cloud service has also been shut down
description: After Stadia's commercial failure, the pivot to Immersive Stream for Games is dead, too.

title: cURL, the omnipresent data tool, is getting a 25th birthday party this month
description: Founder will open a 25-year bottle of Scotch and chat about its history and future.

title: Silicon Valley Bank shut down by US banking regulators
description: Tech-focused lender faced deposit outflows, failed late attempt to raise new capital.

title: Sales of vinyl albums overtake CDs for the first time since the late ’80s
description: Streaming still accounts for 84% of music revenue, but vinyl is having a moment.

title: Spike in deadly strep infections linked to wave of flu, RSV in US kids
description: Group A strep is known to piggyback on viral infections.

title: The 2024 Ford Mustang is the next car to lose AM radio
description: If you listen to a lot of AM radio, the next Ford Mustang is not the car for you.

title: Apple, Foxconn convince Indian state to loosen labor laws
description: Lobbying leads to landmark legislation that anticipates iPhone production.

title: PlayStation’s new Discord integration is a key step for the cross-play dream
description: Before this week, there was no universal VoIP platform for online games.

title: Rocket Report: Boeing to bid SLS for military launch; Ariane chief says all is well
description: "We believe the proven SLS capabilities can be an asset."
